name: The Last Experiment
description:
The Last Experiment 

A happy family of rats was broken by a scientist, whose only purpose is to experiment on poor rats. When he invents an explosive belt and a special labyrinth, one rat invents a way to escape. There’s gonna be casualties.

A re-imagination of the classic. Everybody in this world has his own experience with this type of game - «There is a rat and a cheese. You must find cheese in this labyrinth, cool?». But here you don’t have any cheese in the end. You only get vengeance at the end. Sure, if you were moving fast enough. Clock’s ticking. Tick Tock. Tick Tock. Tick Tock. BOOM! 

He-he, this would be too easy, yeah? There are colourful doors. For every one of them you have to sacrifice your brothers. Of course, the colour of the doors matches the colour of the belts, so do the right choice. And always remember the timers, which have their own time. Stay focused and hurry up, you dirty little rat!

How to move? AWSD 

How to act? E
